b717bec3-f225-408a-ad11-2391dc6158c5.description: Earners of this designation have completed the Client Skills Foundation: Business Development training. The course consists of a combination of self-study and instructor-led training. Earners have an understanding of KPMG’s Business Development approach and tools. Furthermore, they know how to network with current or future clients and are capable of presenting business solutions.
b717bec3-f225-408a-ad11-2391dc6158c5.name: The Business Development 1 credential

badge_template_activities.title: Earners completed a 4 hour self-study program and completed the mandatory pre-classroom reflection and preparation activities.
Earners attended a 4 hour instructor-led classroom training with a focus on role-play scenarios.

c0ace879-1c3a-4619-8b5e-9cd347194228.description: Earners of this designation have completed the Client Skills Foundation: Client Interaction training. The course consists of a combination of self-study and instructor-led training. Earners can effectively communicate face to face, virtually and in writing. Furthermore, earners are able to present themselves to clients, conduct small talk and recognize client challenges.
c0ace879-1c3a-4619-8b5e-9cd347194228.name: The Client Interaction 1 credential

badge_template_activities.title: Earners completed a 4 hour self-study program and completed the mandatory pre-classroom reflection and preparation activities.
Earners attended a 4 hour instructor-led classroom training with a focus on role-play scenarios.

a8fd5775-f3a8-4573-a82c-e9555202a3d7.description: Earners of this designation have completed the Inclusion & Diversity Fundamental training at KPMG. The course is a combination of self-study and reflection. Earners can understand and identify situations of unconscious bias and are able to react appropriately. In addition, earners are able to contribute to an inclusive and diverse culture within KPMG.
a8fd5775-f3a8-4573-a82c-e9555202a3d7.name: The Inclusion & Diversity credential

badge_template_activities.title: Earners completed a 1 hour self-study program.
Earners completed a knowledge assessment in the form of an online quiz.

89915291-9067-4047-a13d-816fc94e3e34.description: Earners of this designation have completed the Leadership Foundations: People Development training. The course consists of a combination of self-study and instructor-led training. Earners can effectively lead and develop employees and are able to apply coaching skills to help guide employees on their career paths. In addition, earners are able to give performance-based feedback and assessments in line with the KPMG annual performance development process.
89915291-9067-4047-a13d-816fc94e3e34.name: The People Development credential

badge_template_activities.title: Earners completed a 4 hour self-study program and completed the mandatory pre-classroom reflection and preparation activities.
Earners attended a 4 hour instructor-led classroom training with a focus on role-play scenarios.

b13e3ee4-0f44-46df-b450-826db3e42ff2.description: Earners of this designation have completed the foundational level of the Data & Analytics training. The course is part of the KPMG Data & Analytics Team and consists of a two day hands-on education. Earners understand the data processing for ERP Analytics and specific KPMG Data & Analytics solutions for audit (“KPMG Clara”) and how to acquire, report and visualize on data.
b13e3ee4-0f44-46df-b450-826db3e42ff2.name: Data & Analytics Professional in an Audit 2023

badge_template_activities.title: The earner participated a 2 days course with a teacher

595c45be-fcdc-43ea-871b-2c4b7d38307e.description: Earners of this designation have completed the foundational level of the KPMG Digital Skills Academy. Earners understand the classification of predictive, prescriptive and descriptive analytics and identify appropriate use-cases for each. In addition, earners know the key aspects of artificial intelligence and robotic process automation and are able to analyze potential applications of each.
595c45be-fcdc-43ea-871b-2c4b7d38307e.name: The Data & Analytics credential

badge_template_activities.title: Earners completed a 5-part online self-study program.
Earners successfully passed the course assessment.

3e037776-5e94-46d9-b949-67fe7f1ca285.description: Earners of this designation have completed the Leadership Foundations: Management Essentials training. The course consists of a combination of self-study and instructor-led training. Earners have an understanding of different management styles and can interact successfully with individuals and teams. In addition, earners are able to identify personality types and adapt their communication style effectively.
3e037776-5e94-46d9-b949-67fe7f1ca285.name: The Management Essentials credential

badge_template_activities.title: Earners completed a 4 hour self-study program and completed the mandatory pre-classroom reflection and preparation activities.
Earners attended a 4 hour instructor-led classroom training with a focus on role-play scenarios.

1fcecbbf-a1fe-4027-9cec-ad7474d08399.description: Earners of this designation have completed the Client Skills Advanced: Sales Techniques training. The course consists of a combination of self-study and instructor-led training. Earners have developed outstanding presentation skills and are able to create a value proposition for clients. In addition, they are able to adapt to different situations and adjust their strategies for Business Development activities.
1fcecbbf-a1fe-4027-9cec-ad7474d08399.name: The Sales Techniques 2 credential

badge_template_activities.title: Earners completed a 4 hour self-study program and completed the mandatory pre and post-classroom reflection and preparation activities.
Earners attended a 4 hour instructor-led classroom training with a focus on role-play scenarios.

b6640fb7-90d3-41d9-89d7-a33bf7c17fd2.description: Earners of this designation have completed the ESG (Environment, Social, Governance) Essentials training at KPMG. The course contains three modules and is completed as eLearning. Earners have a solid understanding of what ESG is and why it is important for KPMG, our clients and society. In addition, earners build basic know-how on how to integrate ESG into our services and identify opportunities for our clients.
b6640fb7-90d3-41d9-89d7-a33bf7c17fd2.name: The ESG Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: Earners completed a three module eLearning program (1 module – 20 mins)

d1cfd67a-f523-4da7-b8ff-bed53ec88e1f.description: Earners of this designation have completed the Client Skills Advanced: Client Interaction training. The course consists of a combination of self-study and instructor-led training. Earners are able to manage challenging situations and adapt their communication approach accordingly. Furthermore, they know how to use these situations to build long-lasting relationships with their clients.
d1cfd67a-f523-4da7-b8ff-bed53ec88e1f.name: The Client Interaction 2 credential

badge_template_activities.title: Earners completed a 4 hour self-study program and completed the mandatory pre and post-classroom reflection and preparation activities.
Earners attended a 4 hour instructor-led classroom training with a focus on role-play scenarios.

4400154b-7f02-4ffe-99a0-45aa1cd009ee.description: Earners of this designation have completed the Leadership Foundations: Leadership Techniques training. The course consists of a combination of self-study and instructor-led training. Earners can effectively lead project-based teams and are able to clearly delegate and distribute tasks and track delivery. In addition, earners are able to give constructive and action-oriented feedback to team members.
4400154b-7f02-4ffe-99a0-45aa1cd009ee.name: The Leadership Techniques credential

badge_template_activities.title: Earners completed a 4 hour self-study program and completed the mandatory pre-classroom reflection and preparation activities.
Earners attended a 4 hour instructor-led classroom training with a focus on role-play scenarios.

428b93a9-2d55-495b-a6e4-2c5d8f9bcb53.description: Earners of this designation have completed the Client Skills Advanced: Business Development training. The course consists of a combination of self-study and instructor-led training. Earners can apply KPMG’s Business Development tools. Furthermore, they are able to conduct open conversations to identify client needs and apply strategies for building long-lasting relationships.
428b93a9-2d55-495b-a6e4-2c5d8f9bcb53.name: The Business Development 2 credential

badge_template_activities.title: Earners completed a 6 hour self-study program and completed the mandatory pre and post-classroom reflection and preparation activities.
Earners attended a 8 hour instructor-led classroom training with a focus on role-play scenarios.

28378858-af7c-4e78-84a4-dc9adde080c4.description: Earners of this designation have completed the Client Skills Expert: Client Interaction training. The course consists of a combination of self-study and instructor-led training. Earners know how to define and apply their individual client acquisition strategy. Furthermore, they can expertly apply their communication skills to identify client needs and address them in conversations.
28378858-af7c-4e78-84a4-dc9adde080c4.name: The Client Interaction 3 credential

badge_template_activities.title: Earners completed a 4 hour self-study program and completed the mandatory pre and post-classroom reflection and preparation activities.
Earners attended a 4 hour instructor-led classroom training with a focus on role-play scenarios.

d02764b1-131f-4997-b7a5-b3b132d4d1bb.description: Earners of this designation have completed the Client Skills Expert: Sales Techniques training. The course consists of a combination of self-study and instructor-led training. Earners are able to write convincing proposals and know how to position pricing models. Furthermore, they can apply consulting strategies with the necessary sensitivity and adaptability.
d02764b1-131f-4997-b7a5-b3b132d4d1bb.name: The Sales Techniques 3 credential

badge_template_activities.title: Earners completed a 4 hour self-study program and completed the mandatory pre and post-classroom reflection and preparation activities.
Earners attended a 4 hour instructor-led classroom training with a focus on role-play scenarios.

914210cc-131e-46c4-a355-23c125b7f2bf.description: Earners of this designation have completed the foundational level of the Lean Scrum training. The course is part of the KPMG Innovation Academy and consists of a one day hands-on education. Earners understand the basic principles of the Scrum methodology and how they can apply it on their client engagements.
914210cc-131e-46c4-a355-23c125b7f2bf.name: The Scrum Fundamentals credential

badge_template_activities.title: Earners completed a one day hands-on training and  a 5-part online self-study program.

2510e254-203a-4ff7-8fbb-922f9eb22ed8.description: Earners of this designation have completed the Leadership Advanced: People Leadership training. The course consists of a combination of self-study and instructor-led training. Earners have a deep understanding of how to motivate and inspire employees to achieve their best results. In addition, earners are able to coach and develop employees on an advanced leadership level.
2510e254-203a-4ff7-8fbb-922f9eb22ed8.name: The People Leadership credential

badge_template_activities.title: Earners completed a 6 hour self-study program and completed the mandatory pre and post-classroom reflection and preparation activities.
Earners attended a 8 hour instructor-led classroom training with a focus on role-play scenarios.

d8e38b64-c343-49f6-88fb-a7431074416b.description: Earners of this designation have completed the foundational level of the Change Management training. The course is part of the KPMG Innovation Academy and consists of a one day hands-on education. Earners understand the change management framework, tools and methods to accompany clients in an organizational change process.
d8e38b64-c343-49f6-88fb-a7431074416b.name: The Change Management Fundamentals credential

badge_template_activities.title: Earners completed a one day hands-on training and  a 5-part online self-study program.

e5ee2ca7-a7a7-4811-b116-4b28a1c07c25.description: Earners of this designation have contributed to the learning content provided as part of the KPMG Digital Skills Academy. Earners are either initiators of the DSA and members of KPMG’s NextGen Board or internal experts presenting their own use cases in the field of data analytics and automation. Earners demonstrate a sound understanding of the key aspects of artificial intelligence and robotic process automation and are able to analyze potential applications of each.
e5ee2ca7-a7a7-4811-b116-4b28a1c07c25.name: The Digital Skills Academy Co-Creator credential

badge_template_activities.title: Earners have demonstrated the application of analytics technology with a real-life use case.
Earners contributed to the concept and creation of the KPMG Digital Skills Academy.

e47842c5-5811-45be-aa28-706c62182051.description: Earners of this designation have completed the foundational level of the Scrum Master training. The course is part of the KPMG Innovation Academy and consists of a one day hands-on education. Earners understand the basic principles of the Scrum Master role and can apply it on their client engagements.
e47842c5-5811-45be-aa28-706c62182051.name: Scrum Master Innovation Academy 2023

badge_template_activities.title: Earners completed a one day hands-on training.

3d16e830-852d-40b9-8666-d806d5bc57ea.description: Earners of this designation have completed the Client Skills Expert: Business Development training. The course consists of a combination of self-study and instructor-led training. Earners have a deep understanding of KPMG’s go to market approach strategy and expertly apply the available tools. In addition, they are able to analyze and utilize their network to further their Business Development activities independently.
3d16e830-852d-40b9-8666-d806d5bc57ea.name: The Business Development 3 credential

badge_template_activities.title: Earners completed a 4 hour self-study program and completed the mandatory pre and post-classroom reflection and preparation activities.
Earners attended a 4 hour instructor-led classroom training with a focus on role-play scenarios.

0c94cf0c-6259-4ce2-9d15-e8b88f1038b6.description: Earners of this designation have demonstrated a standout affinity for innovation and impress with their creative mindset. Earners have significantly contributed to the improvement of client services and processes within the Financial Services practice through presenting ideas and following through to implementation. Earners stand out within KPMG, as only 7 Innovation badges are issued every year. At KPMG we recognize a dare to innovate mindset!
0c94cf0c-6259-4ce2-9d15-e8b88f1038b6.name: The FS Innovation Award 2023 credential

badge_template_activities.title: Earners completed a project that signifies a significant improvement of an existing process or solution and represents a high standard in the following internal innovation criteria: relevancy, brand fit, differentiation, marketability, feasibility.

b85e9e32-fce9-42a8-9044-f6d1b487f567.description: Earners of this designation are within the Financial Services practice and have demonstrated excellent leadership skills in line with KPMG values. Earners are able to consistently motivate, guide, and coach employees and have been able to create inclusive and collaborative team environments. Earners stand out within KPMG, as only 4 Leadership badges are issued every year. At KPMG we recognize a dare to lead mindset!
b85e9e32-fce9-42a8-9044-f6d1b487f567.name: The FS Leadership Award 2023 credential

badge_template_activities.title: Applicants have demonstrated the following advanced leadership skills: career coaching, educating, motivation techniques.
Earners have received high  assessment results during the formal bottom-up feedback process with their team

9ef60994-d7c2-45d5-a800-5c057ba8dd78.description: Earners of this designation have completed the foundational level of the Design Thinking training. The course is part of the KPMG Innovation Academy and consists of a one day hands-on education. Earners understand the theory and functionality of Design Thinking, the relationship between the phases and the importance of iteration. Moreover, they are able to apply user-centered problem solving abilities on their client engagements.
9ef60994-d7c2-45d5-a800-5c057ba8dd78.name: The Design Thinking Fundamentals credential

badge_template_activities.title: Earners completed a one day hands-on training and  a 5-part online self-study program.

839a2e9e-570b-4b50-a4d2-6430847a4091.description: Earners of this designation have demonstrated a standout affinity for innovation and impress with their creative mindset. Earners have significantly contributed to the improvement of client services and processes within the Management Consulting practice through presenting ideas and following through to implementation. Earners stand out within KPMG, as only one team within Management Consulting are awarded an Innovation badge every year. At KPMG we recognize a dare to innovate mindset!
839a2e9e-570b-4b50-a4d2-6430847a4091.name: The Management Consulting Innovation Award 2023 credential

badge_template_activities.title: Earners completed a project that signifies a significant improvement of an existing process or solution and demonstrates a new approach whilst upholding our high standards of quality.

13098e76-43c3-4ad3-ac5f-d6e2dd68cdce.description: Earners of this badge understand the value and benefits of digital badging and how to leverage digital badges to recognize our peoples skills and experiences across all forms of learning. These individuals are capable of talking about the value of digital badges and how, as part of our wider learning ecosystem, they support our culture of life-long learning, signaling the in-demand skills important for growth.
13098e76-43c3-4ad3-ac5f-d6e2dd68cdce.name: KPMG Digital Badges - Ambassador

issuer.summary: issued by KPMG AG and authorized by KPMG International

badge_template_activities.title: Participated in shaping KPMG's digital badge program, leveraging best-practices to build and support our digital badge solution.

Led and/or contributed to discussions around digital badges at KPMG, ensuring all stakeholders understood the benefits of digital badges and how to maximise their success in our collective goal for life-long learning.

cea1be7f-3dce-43a8-8219-14aa9f17116c.description: Earners of this designation have completed the foundational level of the Lean Startup training. The course is part of the KPMG Innovation Academy and consists of a one day hands-on education. Earners understand the basic principles of the Lean Startup methodology and how they can implement lean techniques on their client engagements.
cea1be7f-3dce-43a8-8219-14aa9f17116c.name: The Lean Startup Fundamentals credential

badge_template_activities.title: Earners completed a one day hands-on training and  a 5-part online self-study program.
